channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 16 Best Gifts for Men, Manly Men, and Menly Man Men (2025)
item.description: When you need something that's as unnecessarily masculinized as you can get for the Man™ in your life, we have you covered.

item.title: The 11 Best Xbox Accessories You Can Buy (2025)
item.description: From headsets to hard drives, these are the best Xbox accessories.

item.title: Wildfires Are One of Hurricane Helene’s Lasting Legacies
item.description: A number of fires broke out in the Southeastern US last week. Hurricane-downed trees may have helped fuel the flames, experts say.

item.title: Nvidia GTC 2025: What to expect from this year’s show

item.title: The 23 Best Shows on Amazon Prime Right Now (March 2025)
item.description: The Wheel of Time, Reacher, and Fallout are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.
